alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 26 at 1:26PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow with total accumulations of 4 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central Nebraska. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel conditions due to slick and snow packed roads. Patchy blowing will further reduce visibilities. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to fall along a west- northwest to east-southeast oriented band. Within this band, there will be a sharp gradient in snow accumulations. Within the core of the heaviest band, snowfall rates may approach one inch per hour. For more information from the National Weather Service visit http://weather.gov/lbf
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
